item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (478 points | 140 comments)
2. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (177 points | 73 comments)
3. iOS Kindle app now has a ‘get book’ button after changes to App Store rules (18 points | 7 comments)
4. Preparing for When the Machine Stops (36 points | 13 comments)
5. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (53 points | 16 comments)
6. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring Software Engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)
7. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (255 points | 272 comments)
8. Scientists discover new way to convert corn waste to low-cost sugar for biofuel (7 points | discuss)
9. TeleMessage, used by Trump officials, can access plaintext chat logs (72 points | 10 comments)
10. The curse of knowing how, or; fixing everything (847 points | 368 comments)
11. Will Supercapacitors Come to AI's Rescue? (25 points | 20 comments)
12. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (49 points | 11 comments)
13. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (147 points | 68 comments)
14. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (181 points | 57 comments)
15. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (70 points | 36 comments)
16. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (220 points | 159 comments)
17. Show HN: Sheet Music in Smart Glasses (115 points | 12 comments)
18. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (388 points | 368 comments)
19. A Step Towards Music Generation Foundation Model (3 points | discuss)
20. Show HN: Feedsmith — Fast parser & generator for RSS, Atom, OPML feed namespaces (29 points | 4 comments)
21. Sneakers (1992) – 4K makeover sourced from the original camera negative (333 points | 240 comments)
22. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (36 points | 12 comments)
23. Curl: We still have not seen a single valid security report done with AI help (273 points | 133 comments)
24. Design and evaluation of a parrot-to-parrot video-calling system (2023) (120 points | 53 comments)
25. Transform DOCX into LLM-ready data (5 points | 4 comments)
26. MTerrain: Optimized terrain system and editor for Godot (58 points | 4 comments)
27. Propositions as Types (2014) [pdf] (87 points | 47 comments)
28. The Inchtuthil Nail Hoard (55 points | 13 comments)
29. GenAI-Accelerated TLA+ Challenge (20 points | 6 comments)
30. Show HN: Reverse Pac-Man (52 points | 34 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, May 6, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
